# meru.org — URL Inventory (autogenerated)

This folder contains a verified inventory of URLs discovered on **https://www.meru.org/** and discovered **subdomains of meru.org**.

Outputs:
- `crawl_report.md` — crawl settings, robots rules respected, counts, errors.
- `urls_all_verified.csv` — all URLs with HTTP status + type classification.
- `urls_by_section.md` — grouped list by site section/path.
- `urls_youtube.txt` — extracted YouTube/video links (for `youtube-transcript` skill).

Generated by OpenClaw at 2026-02-04.
